name: ADN Comunicación
tagline: To think is the way, More powerful to do.
description: The world may not be as well designed as you think. Life can seem like a fluke. No one understands very well, yet, neither emotions nor reason. And we live on that. The truth is that everything that is automatic is predictable. It's good to check things all the time. Do not settle. Ideas do not work the same everywhere, nor at all times. Strategies that are not unique and unrepeatable, are not great strategies. Rethink all the time, to get as close as possible to the extraordinary.
